name: Thief Story

files.file1: N/A:Please select the game archive from https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE196106.html

content:
exe: Thief_Story.sh
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the game archive from https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE196106.html
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/Thief_Story-1.0-linux.tar.bz2
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/Thief_Story.sh
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/lib/linux-i686/Thief_Story
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/lib/linux-x86_64/Thief_Story
